This vibrant event is not just about the challenge; it's about celebrating the joy of running with our beloved furry Highland Cows as your inspiration!  
 
Kicking off at 9 AM from The Last Hop, this unique 7-hour Time Challenge allows participants to choose their distance, with options ranging from a minimum of 3 km to ultra distances of 50 km. Plus, finishers will receive a charming Highland Cow medal and a goody bag full of delightful treats. Mark your calendars for this fun-filled day of fitness, community, and furry friends—The Highland Hotfoot awaits!

Join us for the exhilarating Queen Elizabeth Country Park Trail Run, hosted by UK Running Events on Saturday, January 31, 2026, in the picturesque town of Horndean, Hampshire. Set within the breathtaking South Downs, an Area of Outstanding Natural Beauty, this event promises an unforgettable experience for trail running enthusiasts of all levels.  
 
Participants can choose from three exciting race distances, all starting and finishing at the stunning Queen Elizabeth Country Park. As you traverse the spectacular tree-lined trails and tackle the hard-packed off-road paths, you'll be immersed in the serene beauty of ancient woodlands and the iconic South Downs Way. Feel the thrill as you run through the famous local trail, the ‘Milky Way,’ and enjoy the weatherproof, gravel tracks of ‘War Down’. Cross the finish line to earn a high-quality medal, a finisher’s gift, and a refreshing drink to celebrate your achievement. Don't forget to check out the RunRebel Merch tent for some stylish souvenirs to remember your day! This unique weekly run is designed to make your long miles feel lighter while connecting with fellow running enthusiasts. Over the course of 14 weeks, leading up to the prestigious London Marathon, participants will have the opportunity to join one of five pace groups, ranging from 4.45/km to 7.15/km, ensuring that everyone finds their perfect pace. 
 
Starting and finishing at The Clubhouse, we meet every Sunday morning with the first group setting off at 7:45 AM. Each session is supported by dedicated Long Run leaders who know the routes and ensure that no one is left behind. After conquering your miles, unwind and enjoy a well-deserved coffee from our friends at Origin Coffee. Plus, by signing in each week, you can unlock exclusive rewards from our partners. Get ready for an exhilarating adventure at The Drop in Norwich, Norfolk, on Sunday, January 11, 2026! Organized by The Drop, this unique event promises to be one of the most thrilling and challenging races in the UK, designed to test your resilience and resourcefulness. Participants can choose between two exciting race distances: a daring 15-mile trek or a challenging 10-mile journey, either solo or as part of a team.  
 
The Drop takes you on an unforgettable experience where you'll be whisked away to an undisclosed drop-off location, blindfolded, and then tasked with finding your way back to the event center using nothing but your instincts and determination. With no GPS, maps, or external help allowed, this race is a true test of wits. Whether you decide to run, walk, or crawl, the thrill of navigating your way back awaits! Get ready for an unforgettable trail running experience at the inaugural RunThrough Trails Pila, presented by Sugar Trail! Taking place from July 31 to August 1, 2026, in the stunning Gressan, Aosta, this exciting event invites runners of all levels to explore the breathtaking beauty of the Italian Alps. Participants can choose from three exhilarating race distances: the challenging 50K starting at 8 AM on Saturday, the scenic 21K at 10 AM also on Saturday, and the thrilling Up & Down Race kicking off at 6 PM on Friday evening. 
 
Set at an impressive altitude of 1800m, the race will take you on fantastic trails that lead you through enchanting forests and up to stunning ridges, with the iconic silhouettes of Mont Blanc and the Monte Rosa as your backdrop. The historic valley town of Aosta serves as the gateway to Pila, a charming mountain village that perfectly captures the essence of the Italian Alps. Join us for this incredible adventure, where you’ll not only challenge yourself but also create unforgettable memories amidst some of the most picturesque scenery on Earth. Don't miss out on this opportunity to experience the thrill of trail running in one of Italy's hidden gems, brought to you by RunThrough Events
